mapper.select: select authority.description from authority where authority.id in ( select authority_id from (select functions.id as id from functions inner join (select function_id as id from role_function where role_id = #{roleId}) as t on functions.id = t.id where start_time < #{currentTime} and end_time > #{currentTime} ) as x inner join function_authority on function_authority.function_id = x.id )
select authority.url from authority where authority.status = 1
